Package control

Class MovieController

java.lang.Object
control.DatabaseController<Movie>
control.MovieController
public class MovieController extends DatabaseController<Movie>
Represents a MovieController which contains the logic for handling Movie data.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    MovieController()
    Creates a MovieController with the file path of the movie database file to access.

  • Method Details

    • findMovie

      public Movie findMovie(int id)
      Returns a movie by searching with its movie id in the movie database.
      Parameters:
      id - Id of movie to be searched.
      Returns:
      Returns movie with matching id if found in database, else null.

    • findMovies

      public ArrayList<Movie> findMovies(String title)
      Returns a list of movies by searching with titles containing matching keywords in the movie database.
      Parameters:
      title - Title of movie to be searched.
      Returns:
      Returns list of matching movies if found in database, else null.

    • deleteMovie

      public boolean deleteMovie(int id)
      Deletes movie by searching with the given movie id in the movie database.
      Parameters:
      id - Id of movie to be deleted.
      Returns:
      Returns true if movie is successfully deleted, else false.

    • updateMovieAttribute

      public void updateMovieAttribute(Movie movie, Enumerators.MovieAttribute attribute, Object newAttributeValue)
      Updates the selected movie's entry in the movie database with the given new attribute.
      Parameters:
      movie - Movie to be updated.
      attribute - Movie attribute to be updated.
      newAttributeValue - New attribute value.

    • addReviewToMovie

      public void addReviewToMovie(Movie movie, Review review)
      Adds the given review to the given movie's entry and updates the movie's average rating in the movie database.
      Parameters:
      movie - Selected movie to be updated.
      review - New review to be added for the movie.

    • sortByRating

      public ArrayList<Movie> sortByRating(ArrayList<Movie> movies)
      Sorts the given list of movies in descending order based on its averageReviewRating attribute.
      Parameters:
      movies - List of movies to be sorted.
      Returns:
      Returns a list of movies sorted by rating.

    • sortByTicketSales

      public ArrayList<Movie> sortByTicketSales(ArrayList<Movie> movies)
      Sorts the given list of movies in descending order based on its ticketSales attribute.
      Parameters:
      movies - List of movies to be sorted.
      Returns:
      Returns a list of movies sorted by ticket sales.
